name: postcss-classes-to-mixins
description: PostCSS plugin to intelligently convert CSS classes to SASS, Less and Stylus mixins

scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch -m 'Release patch %s' && npm run push
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor -m 'Release minor %s' && npm run push
scripts.publish:major: npm version major -m 'Release major %s' && npm run push
scripts.push: git commit -am "Update version number" && git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: NRK <opensource@nrk.no> (https://www.nrk.no/)
